name: tick-cache
description: High-performance TTL cache with LRU eviction using a timer wheel algorithm

scripts.bench: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--expose-gc" tsx bench/index.ts -o bench/outputs/bench-results.json
scripts.bench:smoke: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--expose-gc" tsx bench/index.ts --ops 100000 --warmup 5000 -o bench/outputs/bench-smoke.json
scripts.bench:workload: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--expose-gc" tsx bench/index.ts -w
scripts.bench:prof: npm run build && node --expose-gc --cpu-prof --cpu-prof-dir=bench/outputs --import tsx/esm bench/index.ts -o bench/outputs/bench-prof.json
scripts.bench:full: npm run bench && npm run bench:report

author: Martin
